channel.title: Xiaomi 11T Pro MIUI Updates Tracker by XiaomiFirmwareUpdater
channel.description: Your best website to track MIUI ROM releases!

image.title: Xiaomi 11T Pro MIUI Updates Tracker by XiaomiFirmwareUpdater

item.title: MIUI OS1.0.10.0.UKDINXM Fastboot update for Xiaomi 11T Pro India
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Xiaomi 11T Pro India

Codename: vili

Version: OS1.0.10.0.UKDINXM | 14.0

Size: 5.9 GB

MD5: 6451f2a423be49e3caa88fad96bbff81

Changelog:
[Highlights]
Optimization: Frame drops and stuttering issues in Honor of Kings
[System]
Optimization: System stability
Fix: Errors occurred in some cases
Updated the security patch to February 2025. Increased system security.

Download: Here
